name: Burn The Kingdom
description:
ROAR! It's time to bring some fire into the peaceful kingdom! Burn houses and kill people until you get right to the king!

Made for the "I can't draw but want to make a game (again)" jam.

Music and sounds are licensed under CC0:

  • "Adventures of Flying Jack" by Alexander Nakarada
  • "Adventure Time" by Scribe
  • "Black Knight" by Rafael Krux
  • Sounds by rubberduck
